avdta.gui.editor.visual.rules

Class NodeDataRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.gui.editor.visual.rules.NodeRule
      • avdta.gui.editor.visual.rules.NodeDataRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class NodeDataRule
extends NodeRule
    The NodeDataRule draws Nodes based on an associated NodeDataSource. The NodeDataSource provides some data, which is compared with user-specified minimum and maximum values. Using this data, corresponding radius and fill colors are selected. Note that the NodeDataRule matches every Node.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
